# Load package and file

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)

# read CSV 
df <- read_csv(
  "Drug_overdose_death_rates__by_drug_type__sex__age__race__and_Hispanic_origin__United_States.csv",
  col_types = cols(ESTIMATE = col_character())
)

# Clean
df_clean <- df %>%
  rename(
    drug_type = PANEL,
    unit = UNIT,
    group_category = STUB_NAME,
    group_label = STUB_LABEL,
    year = YEAR,
    age = AGE,
    death_rate = ESTIMATE
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    death_rate = na_if(death_rate, "*"),
    death_rate = as.numeric(death_rate)
  ) %>%
  mutate(across(c(drug_type, unit, group_category, group_label, age), as.factor)) %>%
  filter(
    unit == "Deaths per 100,000 resident population, age-adjusted",
    age == "All ages"
  )

glimpse(df_clean)
```
